name: Episode 4: 3D Card Flip Animation
description:
This is a required asset for the video tutorial where I teach how to animate 3D Flip Credit Card UI in After Effects.


Link to Tutorial: https://youtu.be/XPQxoAgTRtM


Share and spread the love!
